Class DBController

  • java.lang.Object
    • executable.DBController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAppConstants

    public class DBController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAppConstants
    Objects of DBController class are used to help to communicate with data base from other parts of program.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntityManager

        public javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
        Returns:
        EntityManager object connected to proper data base (to change connection url go to persistance.xml)

      • getItemList

        public java.util.List<Item> getItemList()
        Creates Query object, which selects all items stored in table in data base, and then saves them in List object.
        Returns:
        List object containing all items stored in data base

      • getMagazine

        public Magazine getMagazine()
        Finds Magazine with id = 1 in data base (in this app we use only one Magazine).
        Returns:
        the only one Magazine used in this program

      • countItemsInMagazine

        public int countItemsInMagazine()
        Returns:
        amount of items stored in Magazine

      • printItems

        public void printItems()
        Prints names of all items stored in Magazine.

      • itemNameExistsInMagazine

        public boolean itemNameExistsInMagazine(Item item)
        Checks if data base already contains Item with a name equal to name of Item given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        item - Object given to check if Item with the same name exits in data base already
        Returns:
        true if such Item exits, otherwise false

      • addItemToMagazine

        public void addItemToMagazine(Item item)
        Adds given Item to data base.
        Parameters:
        item - Object to add to data base
